Desc.entry: The keys allow disabled people access to any toilets nation-wide. The individual can obtain keys at a cost of Â£3 from First Point, Howden House; via the internet at www.radar.org.uk or by writing to Radar Direct, 12 City Forum, 250 City Road, London, EC1V 8AF. For information on Changing Places toilets please see separate entry or visit www.changing-places.org
